#Text=BJP 's Narendra
#Text=Modi elected new prime minister of India
#Text=Saturday , May 17 , 2014
#Text=Official image of Narendra Modi in 2013 .
#Text=Image : Narendra Modi .
#Text=Power in India is set to transfer to the Bharatiya Janata Party ( BJP ) and the leader Narendra Modi following an election in the world 's largest democracy .
#Text=The ruling Congress Party conceded defeat yesterday and BJP are set to win a healthy majority of seats .
#Text=The success for the Hindu nationalist party in the election tracks predicted results from exit polls .
#Text=Following the victory , Modi posted on social networking site Twitter " India has won .

column1: #Text=Modi has been Gujarat chief minister since 2001 .
#Text=Modi has been controversial since a violent riot erupted in Gujarat in 2002 which led to the death of about a thousand people , primarily Muslims .
#Text=Modi 's critics allege he let the inter-religious violence happen without much effort to stop it .
#Text=He was subsequently denied visas to travel to the United States , and the United Kingdom cut ties with him .
#Text=In 2012 , a Special Investigations Team appointed by the Indian Supreme Court found no evidence for Modi 's role in the violence .
#Text=Following this , the British high commissioner in India decided to reconnect with Modi and invite him to visit London to address the House of Commons .
#Text=The United States has warmed up to Modi again and in February he met with Nancy Powell , the US ambassador to India .
#Text=During the elections , Modi attempted to reassure Muslims that he would protect all religious groups in India , telling The Times of India : " I 've to run the government .
